folder: Gramercy Park South & 3rd Avenue, Manhattan, NY
text:
26, 25-24, and 23 (from left to right) Gramercy Park South, south side, between Third Ave., and Irving Place, as seen from Gramercy Park East (foreground). On the right is shown a small portion of Gramercy Park, and in the background the tower of the Consolidated Edison Co. Building, No. 226 is the Hotel Irwing.

July 7, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Manhattan: Gramercy Park South - 3rd Avenue
